```{r}
#|: using-wbstats-pkg-to-get-GDPs-and-total-exports
# in USD + years 

gdp <- c("GDP" = "NY.GDP.MKTP.CD")
exports <- c("total_exports" ="BX.GSR.GNFS.CD")
indicators <- c(gdp, exports)

total <- wb_data(
  indicators, 
  country = "all",
  mrv = 5
)

view(total)
```
